name: Witches' Hue
description:
HOW TO PLAY
——————————————

This game runs off a mechanic similar to a match-three puzzle game, specifically Puzzles and Dragons.

The player drags the Eye Sigil around the board in the aim to create as many 3+ matches as possible.

Also on the board are [Magenta, Orange, Yellow, Green, Cyan, and Violet] pieces. Magenta, Yellow and Cyan are considered PRIMARY Colors and the rest are SECONDARY Colors, which are colors made up of two (2) primary colors.

Orange = Magenta + Yellow
Green = Yellow + Cyan
Violet = Cyan + Magenta

Clicking on the Eye Sigil will cause it to absorb the most common primary color from the pieces surrounding it. Once the Eye Sigil absorbs a color, the next time its picked up it will release its color to the surrounding pieces.

If you get three or more pieces into a line, the bottles break, replaced with new bottles to continue to match.
